com.turn.ttorrent.client.peer

Interface PeerConnectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, PeerIdentityProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwarmHandler

    public interface PeerConnectionListener
extends PeerIdentityProvider, java.util.EventListener
    EventListener interface for objects that want to handle incoming peer connections.

      • handlePeerDisconnected

        void handlePeerDisconnected(@Nonnull
                          PeerHandler peer)
        Peer disconnection handler.

        This handler is fired when a peer disconnects, or is disconnected due to protocol violation.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer we got this piece from.

      • handleIOException

        void handleIOException(@Nonnull
                     PeerHandler peer,
                     @CheckForNull
                     java.io.IOException ioe)
        Handler for IOException during peer operation.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer whose activity trigger the exception.
        ioe - The IOException object, for reporting.
